title: When in Doubt......?
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Whi-ch, bre-ad, should, I, pick~ ùÖ†<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Isn‚Äôt it really hard to decide? There are so many to choose from.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Right?! But all the bread here is delicious! Everything here is a good option~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Can we just buy everything?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>No, no! That‚Äôs not how it works! Choosing is part of the fun! Come on, Lanzhu-chan, enjoy the process.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Huh...? But it‚Äôs too hard for Lanzhu...... I want them all...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Then you should just get the same one as me! Alright, I pick this one! Here you go, Lanzhu-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>......I get to match with you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That‚Äôs right! Isn‚Äôt it exciting? It‚Äôs so much fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I‚Äôm super happy!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Oh, you‚Äôre making me blush with that kind of enthusiasm~ Let‚Äôs buy some coffee milk and eat in the park.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Matching coffee milk too! This is the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let‚Äôs go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
